input: Integrate credit bureau and income verification APIs to process a loan application under regulatory constraints, update the loan ledger, and disburse funds.

inputs.name: L
inputs.input_data: Applicant personal details (name, SSN), employment history, requested loan amount, disbursement account details

inputs.name: C
inputs.source_origin: Third-party credit bureau service (e.g., Experian, TransUnion)
inputs.input_data: API endpoint URL, authentication token, query parameters

inputs.name: I
inputs.source_origin: Third-party income verification service (e.g., Plaid, Argyle)
inputs.input_data: API endpoint URL, authentication token, query parameters

inputs.name: R
inputs.input_data: Maximum allowable debt-to-income ratio (numeric), minimum credit score threshold

inputs.name: A
inputs.input_data: Bank account number, routing number, account holder name

inputs.name: C
inputs.input_data: Applicant’s credit score, total monthly debt obligations

inputs.name: I
inputs.input_data: Gross monthly income, employment status confirmation

inputs.name: D
inputs.source_origin: Credit Bureau Data Response (Input 7) + Income Verification Data Response (Input 8)
inputs.bound_reference: Credit Bureau Data Response (Input 7), Income Verification Data Response (Input 8)

steps:
Uses: Loan Application Data  
Action: Validate completeness and format of applicant-submitted data  
Produces: Structured Loan Application Packet  
Stores/Sends To: Internal processing queue

Uses: Credit Bureau API Credentials, Loan Application Data  
Action: Query credit bureau API with applicant’s SSN/name  
Produces: Credit Bureau Data Response  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary processing buffer

Uses: Income Verification API Credentials, Loan Application Data  
Action: Query income verification API with employment details  
Produces: Income Verification Data Response  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary processing buffer

Uses: Credit Bureau Data Response, Income Verification Data Response  
Action: Calculate debt-to-income ratio using formula: (Total Debt / Gross Income) * 100  
Produces: Debt-to-Income Ratio  
Stores/Sends To: Compliance evaluation module

Uses: Debt-to-Income Ratio, Regulatory Constraints  
Action: Compare DTI against user-defined threshold (e.g., 43%)  
Produces: Loan Approval Status Report  
Stores/Sends To: Compliance audit log

Uses: Loan Approval Status Report, Loan Ledger Access Permissions  
Action: Write approved loan details to loan ledger database  
Produces: Updated Loan Ledger Entry  
Stores/Sends To: Internal loan management system

Uses: Loan Approval Status Report, Applicant Disbursement Account Details  
Action: Initiate fund disbursement via banking API using provided account details  
Produces: Fund Disbursement Confirmation  
Stores/Sends To: Banking system audit log
execution_plan.raw_response:
Inputs:  
1. Loan Application Data  
   Source Type: USER-CONTROLLED  
   Source Origin: Applicant submission  
   Input Data: Applicant personal details (name, SSN), employment history, requested loan amount, disbursement account details  
   Bound Reference: N/A  
   Note: Requires explicit user provision or linkage.  

2. Credit Bureau API Credentials  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: Third-party credit bureau service (e.g., Experian, TransUnion)  
   Input Data: API endpoint URL, authentication token, query parameters  
   Bound Reference: Credit Bureau API Integration Guide  

3. Income Verification API Credentials  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: Third-party income verification service (e.g., Plaid, Argyle)  
   Input Data: API endpoint URL, authentication token, query parameters  
   Bound Reference: Income Verification API Documentation  

4. Regulatory Constraints (e.g., debt-to-income threshold)  
   Source Type: USER-CONTROLLED  
   Source Origin: Lending institution compliance team  
   Input Data: Maximum allowable debt-to-income ratio (numeric), minimum credit score threshold  
   Bound Reference: N/A  
   Note: Requires explicit user provision or linkage.  

5. Loan Ledger Access Permissions  
   Source Type: SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE  
   Source Origin: Internal loan management system  
   Input Data: Database connection string, write-access credentials  
   Bound Reference: Internal Loan Management System (v2.1)  

6. Applicant Disbursement Account Details  
   Source Type: USER-CONTROLLED  
   Source Origin: Applicant submission  
   Input Data: Bank account number, routing number, account holder name  
   Bound Reference: Loan Application Data (Input 1)  
   Note: Requires explicit user provision or linkage.  

7. Credit Bureau Data Response  
   Source Type: DERIVABLE  
   Source Origin: Credit Bureau API (Input 2)  
   Input Data: Applicant’s credit score, total monthly debt obligations  
   Bound Reference: Credit Bureau API Credentials (Input 2)  
   Note: [DEPTH STOP - Terminal input, do not further decompose]  

8. Income Verification Data Response  
   Source Type: DERIVABLE  
   Source Origin: Income Verification API (Input 3)  
   Input Data: Gross monthly income, employment status confirmation  
   Bound Reference: Income Verification API Credentials (Input 3)  
   Note: [DEPTH STOP - Terminal input, do not further decompose]  

9. Debt-to-Income Ratio  
   Source Type: DERIVABLE  
   Source Origin: Credit Bureau Data Response (Input 7) + Income Verification Data Response (Input 8)  
   Input Data: (Total Monthly Debt / Gross Monthly Income) * 100  
   Bound Reference: Credit Bureau Data Response (Input 7), Income Verification Data Response (Input 8)  
   Note: [DEPTH STOP - Terminal input, do not further decompose]  

Outputs:  
1. Credit Bureau API Response Log  
   Type: Observable artifact  
   Description: Raw data retrieved from credit bureau (credit score, debts)  

2. Income Verification API Response Log  
   Type: Observable artifact  
   Description: Raw data retrieved from income verification service  

3. Loan Approval Status Report  
   Type: Measurable report  
   Description: Pass/fail result of regulatory checks (e.g., "DTI 35% ≤ 43% threshold")  

4. Updated Loan Ledger Entry  
   Type: Persisted state change  
   Description: New record in loan ledger with applicant ID, loan amount, status, disbursement timestamp  

5. Fund Disbursement Confirmation  
   Type: Triggered action  
   Description: Automated ACH/wire transfer confirmation from banking system  

Steps:  
Step 1:  
Uses: Loan Application Data  
Action: Validate completeness and format of applicant-submitted data  
Produces: Structured Loan Application Packet  
Stores/Sends To: Internal processing queue  

Step 2:  
Uses: Credit Bureau API Credentials, Loan Application Data  
Action: Query credit bureau API with applicant’s SSN/name  
Produces: Credit Bureau Data Response  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary processing buffer  

Step 3:  
Uses: Income Verification API Credentials, Loan Application Data  
Action: Query income verification API with employment details  
Produces: Income Verification Data Response  
Stores/Sends To: Temporary processing buffer  

Step 4:  
Uses: Credit Bureau Data Response, Income Verification Data Response  
Action: Calculate debt-to-income ratio using formula: (Total Debt / Gross Income) * 100  
Produces: Debt-to-Income Ratio  
Stores/Sends To: Compliance evaluation module  

Step 5:  
Uses: Debt-to-Income Ratio, Regulatory Constraints  
Action: Compare DTI against user-defined threshold (e.g., 43%)  
Produces: Loan Approval Status Report  
Stores/Sends To: Compliance audit log  

Step 6:  
Uses: Loan Approval Status Report, Loan Ledger Access Permissions  
Action: Write approved loan details to loan ledger database  
Produces: Updated Loan Ledger Entry  
Stores/Sends To: Internal loan management system  

Step 7:  
Uses: Loan Approval Status Report, Applicant Disbursement Account Details  
Action: Initiate fund disbursement via banking API using provided account details  
Produces: Fund Disbursement Confirmation  
Stores/Sends To: Banking system audit log  

Dependency Consistency Check:  
- All inputs used in steps are explicitly declared  
- All derivable inputs fully decomposed to SYSTEM/USER sources  
- No implicit data sources present  
- USER-CONTROLLED inputs clearly marked with provision requirements  
- SYSTEM-RETRIEVABLE inputs include API/database references  
- [DEPTH STOP] applied only to terminal inputs (7, 8, 9)
